metadata.summary: All metadata quality checks pass. The milestone description is concise and release-notes-ready, the design document status is correctly set to "Planned", and the milestone state is "open" with all 46 issues closed as expected.

design-goals.summary: Milestone 15 successfully delivered all three strategic milestones from the design document. The implementation achieved the core vision of deterministic recipe execution through a two-phase architecture (eval/exec), with plans stored in state.json and full checksum verification. Two enhancements beyond the design scope were implemented: action decomposition to primitives and nested dependency plans for self-contained installations.

documentation.summary: Milestone M15 documentation is partially complete with significant gaps. Basic plan-based installation is well-documented, but 14 new ecosystem primitives are completely undocumented for users. Critical missing content includes: ecosystem primitive explanation, determinism guarantees, lockfile capture mechanism, and updated ecosystem support claims in README.md. Design docs are excellent but user-facing documentation needs Priority 1 additions before milestone can be considered fully complete.

dead-code.summary: Found 2 low-severity dead code artifacts: debug print statements in npm_exec.go (lines 262-263) and a placeholder issue reference (#XXX) in gem_install.go (line 331). Neither blocks milestone completion but both should be addressed for code quality.
